comment.author: 39839593@N00
comment._content:
The Hague Wood is an English translation for Het Haagse Hout, a neighbourhood and a park in The Hague.

Princess Juliana would later become Queen Juliana of the Netherlands, reigning from 1948 to 1980.

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Her wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Juliana_of_the_Netherlands The Nationaal Archief here on Flickr Commons has a whole set of photos documenting her life: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/nationaalarchief/sets/72157616756343742/] This photo might not be the same day, but it looks like the same season (by the clothes worn), and the same entourage: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/nationaalarchief/3440984209/] Same umbrella, even?!?
